Class Quizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.wsact.mikand.pg4100.assignment2.views.Application
      • no.wsact.mikand.pg4100.assignment2.views.Quizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    class Quizer
extends Application
    This class runs the Quizer application and communicates directly with the client.
    Version:
    14.03.15
    Author:
    Anders Mikkelsen

    • Constructor Detail

      • Quizer

        public Quizer(java.io.BufferedWriter writer,
              java.io.BufferedReader reader)
        This constructor sets the writer and reader. They are not closed in this class, that is handled by the ClientGreeter class.
        Parameters:
        writer - BufferedWriter
        reader - BufferedReader

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Fires up the Runnable and gets the necessary quiz table from the db. Returns to the ClientGreeter on any SQLException.

      • handleQuizRound

        private void handleQuizRound(java.util.List<Row> quizQuestions)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Loops through all questions in the quiz and calls a helper for handling each question. Client can break the quiz after every question.
        Parameters:
        quizQuestions - java.utils.List
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IOException
